channel.title: General Flickr Meme Pockets on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Flickr Meme Pockets on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: The items we carry
item.description: The other day I was on flickr and I happened across a friend’s picture of things that he carries in his pockets. I thought it was really neat. He had linked to the photo pool that had a bundle of people following suit. It is amazing. I immediately took a picture of the things I carry around on me on a daily basis. I don’t have a lot of fancy things.
